definition: a saw/to cut with a saw
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: The ability of the bending and cracking resistance of the steel saw blade was evaluated by bending strength and deflection.
sentences.chinese: 用弯曲强度及挠度评定钢锯条抗弯曲断裂的能力。

sentences.english: The band dimension individually depends on the used cutting machine.
sentences.chinese: 锯条长度尺寸取决于所使用的锯床。

sentences.english: Our company can provide customers a variety of products Saw Blade .
sentences.chinese: 我公司可以为客户提供各种规格的成品锯条。

sentences.english: This company mainly manages the curve saw blade and so on.
sentences.chinese: 本公司主要经营曲线锯条等。

sentences.english: Then someone cut the tree down with a chain saw.
sentences.chinese: 然后有人用一个锯条锯断了这棵树。

sentences.english: Cut and buff tyre sections using a band saw and bench grinder.
sentences.chinese: 用锯条切割轮胎断面并磨平断面。

sentences.english: Saw-guide is a device used to guide sawblade in bandsaws.
sentences.chinese: 导锯器是带锯机切削机构中的锯条导向装置。

sentences.english: He's like a cat in a saw?
The surface cracks of the bimetal strip sawblade was investigated in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 对双金属带锯条表面裂纹的形成原因进行了分析。

sentences.english: The cause of brittle fracture on power hacksaw blades-blank were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 检验分析了机用锯条坯脆断的原因。

sentences.english: The cause of brittle fracture on hacksaw blades - blank were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 检验分析了机用锯条坯脆断的原因。
